articles.title: Galaxy Watch 8 Classic now comes with ultra-cheap Buds 3 Pro - SamMobile

articles.content: Samsung's fan-favorite Classic smartwatch is back after a two year break, and it's now available with one of the best bundle deals we've seen yet. The new Galaxy Watch 8 Classic, complete with its ic… [+2074 chars]
